about_the_game:
Pinball Simulator offers the nostalgia of the 80s and 90s—neon lights, clinking glasses, and classic arcade vibes. Play pinball, master the flippers, chase high scores, and relive the joy of the good old days.

About Pinball Simulator

Pinball Simulator offers a nostalgic journey back to the 80s and 90s, recreating the classic arcade experience with vivid neon lights and the hum of a lively bar. Step up to the machine, hear the satisfying clink of the flippers, and immerse yourself in the thrill of chasing high scores.

Key Features

The Early Access version includes two unique tables: Day of the Dead and Octopus Island, each with its own theme and challenges. Future plans include additional levels, customizable balls, and leaderboards to enhance competition and replayability. Whether you're a pinball pro or a newcomer, Pinball Simulator is your ticket to reliving the magic of the golden arcade era!
